name: SanPatFactory
description:
Inspired by the chocolate factory scene from I Love Lucy.

Keep up with the never-ending conveyor belt! Wrap chocolate bars and cake that come down the line and don't let anything but wrapped chocolate get to the end (throw out any other junk that shows up!).

Get points for wrapped chocolate getting to the end of the conveyor and tossing junk in the trash bins (more points for landing in further bins).
